subject: 蓝精灵们发现神秘洞穴
detail: Animated style, a group of Smurfs on a mountain peak discovering a glowing cave entrance covered in bioluminescent moss and glowing mushrooms; first they notice the soft fluorescent glow of the moss, then curiously approach the cave entrance with wide-eyed wonder and gentle steps, next they huddle together at the threshold exchanging glances, and finally step inside together as light flickers across their faces; misty, ethereal mountain twilight atmosphere with soft volumetric lighting and subtle magical shimmer; horizontal dolly shot moving smoothly left to right along the cave face; background sound: echoing whispers and mysterious ambient hum. Voiceover says in Chinese "有一天，他们发现了一个神秘的洞穴"
image_detail: (动画风格) 一群小精灵在山巅发现一个发光的洞穴，洞口有荧光苔藓和发光蘑菇
narration: 有一天，他们发现了一个神秘的洞穴
